00082  * BSD types replaced by stdint types (feature request #1282721).
00083  *
00084  * Revision 1.3  2008/04/18 13:31:59  haraldkipp
00085  * Changed size parameter from uint16_t to int, which is easier to handle
00086  * for 32-bit targets. You need to recompile your ARM code. No impact on
00087  * AVR expected
00088  * I changed u_int to int at some places to avoid some warnings during
00089  * compilation of Nut/Net.
